job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience

jd: From: Vikas Kardam, Tek Inspiration LLC vikas.kardam@tekinspirations.com Reply to: vikas.kardam@tekinspirations.com Job Description -Infrastructure Project ManagerType- CTHDuration - 6 Months Location: Coraopolis, PA 15106- HYBRID WORK MODEL 2 DAYS IN OFFICE 3 DAYS RESUMEPMP or ITIL Certification MUST BE LOCAL TO PAMUST HAVE FINANCE DOMAIN or MORTGAGE INDUSTRY EXPERIENCEQualifications: Education: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience a related area (computer science, finance, business administration) (a plus).7+ years experience in IT field3-5 years' experience as a Project ManagerExpertise in managing cross-functional teamsPMP or ITIL Certification Job Responsibilities: Oversee all project budgetsLead all major projectsDefine project phases to ensure timely deliveryConducts meetings with IT Teams and Business UnitsProvide project updates and statusManage project issuesComplete project status-reviewsLead group of technical resources to ensure projects are documented correctly and moving along per planIdentify technical requirements from Business Units and IT Departments-DBA Team, Software Team and QA Team
